duties_responsibilities.duty: Operating, maintaining, repairing, and cleaning heavy equipment such as concrete pumps, skid steerers, excavators, specialty drill rigs, etc.
Keeping records to assure project installation parameters are met.
Recognizing conflicts with other work being performed on the job site.
Becoming certified with the various equipment utilized on job sites.
Supporting all field activities on individual project sites.
Serving as a Safety Leader at all times.

education_certification.credential: Vocational school training or apprenticeship preferred, on the job training offered. Prior related experience in mechanical maintenance a plus. Must have the ability to pass required safety certifications.
